title: Leave Policy
description: Employees are entitled to 20 paid leaves per year, excluding public holidays.

title: Remote Work Policy
description: Employees may work remotely up to 3 days a week upon manager approval.

title: Code of Conduct
description: All employees are expected to maintain professionalism and ethical behavior in the workplace.

title: Work Hours
description: Official work hours are from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday. A 1-hour break is given for lunch.

title: Internet Usage Policy
description: Internet resources should be used for work-related tasks only. Unauthorized downloads are prohibited.

title: Dress Code
description: Employees are required to dress in business casual attire unless otherwise specified.

title: Performance Review
description: Performance reviews are conducted annually to assess employee progress and set goals.

title: Travel Policy
description: Business travel must be approved by the department head. Expenses will be reimbursed as per company guidelines.

title: Expense Reimbursement
description: Employees must submit valid receipts for all expenses within 30 days to be eligible for reimbursement.

title: Confidentiality Agreement
description: Employees must not disclose confidential company information to unauthorized persons.

title: Harassment Policy
description: The company maintains a zero-tolerance policy towards harassment of any kind.

title: Equal Opportunity Policy
description: The company is committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of race, gender, or religion.

title: Grievance Redressal
description: Employees can report grievances to HR. All complaints will be handled confidentially.

title: Probation Period
description: New employees are subject to a 3-month probation period before confirmation.

title: Resignation Policy
description: Employees must provide at least 30 days' notice before resignation.

title: Promotion Policy
description: Promotions are based on performance, experience, and organizational requirements.

title: Training and Development
description: The company encourages employees to participate in training programs for skill enhancement.

title: Attendance Policy
description: Employees must mark their attendance daily. Repeated absenteeism may lead to disciplinary action.

title: IT Security Policy
description: Employees must use strong passwords and report any security breaches immediately.

title: Health and Safety Policy
description: The company is committed to maintaining a safe and healthy work environment for all employees.
